thread.title: China’s Resistance to Reform May Grow With IMF Rejection
thread.title_full: China’s Resistance to Reform May Grow With IMF Rejection - WSJ

author: Mark Magnier
title: China’s Resistance to Reform May Grow With IMF Rejection
text:
BEIJING—Political support in China for economic reform, already weakened by the specter of slowing growth, may be further dented by the International Monetary Fund’s indication this week that it won’t add the yuan to an international basket of reserve currencies for at least a year.
The IMF’s disclosure follows a decision in June by index provider MSCI Inc. not to include China’s shares in a global stock index. They signal that many... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
